data.comment: The match is underway at St James' Park.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 1, Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Newcastle.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
In the minute 5, Chelsea drives forward and Timo Werner gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Reece James (Chelsea) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 8, Mateo Kovacic of Chelsea gets in a strike, but is off target.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
Tammy Abraham (Chelsea) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 10, Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Federico Fernandez blunders with an own goal. This makes it 0-1.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Newcastle drive upfield and Jacob Murphy gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Chelsea defender.
Chelsea are pushing forward but Timo Werner's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 15, Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
Craig Pawson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, Throw-in Newcastle.
Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Newcastle.
Goal kick for Newcastle at St James' Park.
In the minute 25, Newcastle to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
Chelsea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Newcastle's Joelinton gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Craig Pawson signals a Chelsea throw-in in Newcastle's half.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Chelsea's Timo Werner breaks free at St James' Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Newcastle in the half of Chelsea.
Reece James (Chelsea) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Allan Saint-Maximin (Newcastle) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Newcastle.
Chelsea are coming forward and Hakim Ziyech gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Craig Pawson awards Newcastle a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jamaal Lascelles for Newcastle who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Newcastle's Jamaal Lascelles is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 39, Free kick Chelsea.
Free kick Chelsea.
Isaac Hayden for Newcastle has been booked by Craig Pawson and receives a first yellow card.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Chelsea at St James' Park.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 45, Chelsea have a dangerous throw-in.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Craig Pawson blows to end the first-half.
Newcastle's Jacob Murphy has been booked in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at St James' Park.
Ball safe as Chelsea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
The home team have replaced Jamaal Lascelles with Fabian Schar. This is the first substitution made today by Steve Bruce.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Newcastle upon Tyne to check on Jamaal Lascelles, who is grimacing with pain.
Newcastle to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
Free kick for Chelsea in the half of Newcastle.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
In the minute 55, Kurt Zouma (Chelsea) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 58, In Newcastle upon Tyne Newcastle attack through Isaac Hayden. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Newcastle in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Craig Pawson signals a Newcastle throw-in in Chelsea's half.
In the minute 60, Newcastle's Joelinton misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of Chelsea.
In the minute 62, Craig Pawson awards Chelsea a goal kick.
Tammy Abraham (Chelsea) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of Chelsea.
Chelsea take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Tammy Abraham.
Great play from Timo Werner to set up the goal.
In the minute 66, Reece James is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Miguel Almiron is on a sub for Javi Manquillo for Newcastle.
Reece James has recovered and rejoins the match in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Newcastle at St James' Park.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Joelinton for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 70, Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Chelsea.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Newcastle.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
In the minute 72, Sean Longstaff (Newcastle) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Goal kick for Chelsea at St James' Park.
Craig Pawson signals a Newcastle throw-in in Chelsea's half.
Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
In the minute 74, Newcastle make their third substitution with Andy Carroll replacing Allan Saint-Maximin.
Chelsea's Timo Werner is whistled for offside at St James' Park.
In the minute 76, Frank Lampard (Chelsea) is making a first substitution, with Callum Hudson-Odoi replacing Timo Werner.
In Newcastle upon Tyne Newcastle's Andy Carroll is caught offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
In the minute 78, Chelsea are pushing forward but Mason Mount's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Newcastle's Miguel Almiron is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Newcastle.
Important block from the Newcastle defence as Callum Hudson-Odoi fires in a strike for Chelsea.
Craig Pawson awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 82, Emerson is replacing Benjamin Chilwell for Chelsea at St James' Park.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Craig Pawson signals a throw-in for Newcastle, close to Chelsea's area.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Chelsea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
The away team replace Hakim Ziyech with Olivier Giroud.
In the minute 88, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Newcastle close to the penalty box.
Craig Pawson blows against Chelsea's Olivier Giroud for offside.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Chelsea to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
Can Chelsea capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Newcastle's half?
Newcastle push forward at St James' Park and Andy Carroll gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Chelsea defence.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
In Newcastle upon Tyne, Jacob Murphy of Newcastle is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Mateo Kovacic (Chelsea) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
That's full-time at St James' Park. The final score is 0-2.
